quest.name: The Forbidden Lran
journal:
 Quest Sync
Lad Kenn is gravely worried for a friend.
objectives: With the chat mode in Say, enter any phrase containing “Kenn Gyuf” to call out to the pixie.

dialogue.name: LADKENN
dialogue.text: Help! Help me, I beg you! My friend has gone to Phisor Lran, a place we're told we must never ever set foot in...

dialogue.name: LADKENN
dialogue.text: I thought about giving chase, but I'm scared I'll run into that...that thing.

dialogue.name: LADKENN
dialogue.text: But you're a big, brave womanman. You're not scared of such things, are you? So please, find and bring back my friend! Kenn Gyuf is their name, and if you hurry you might catch them before they get to Phisor Lran!

dialogue.name: LADKENN
dialogue.text: Please, find and bring back my friend Kenn Gyuf! If you hurry, you might catch them before they get to Phisor Lran!

dialogue.name: KENNGYUF
dialogue.text: Hm? Aren't you one of Urianger's friends? Have you business with me?

dialogue.name: KENNGYUF
dialogue.text: ...Lad Kenn is worried? Well, that's all well and good, but when someone tells me not to do something, it only makes me want to do it more!

dialogue.name: KENNGYUF
dialogue.text: Tee hee hee! No one can stop me!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Heedless of your warning, Kenn Gyuf continues on in the direction of Phisor Lran. If you find them again, perhaps you can still convince them to turn back.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Kenn Gyuf

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: With the chat mode in Say, use your keyboard or the software keyboard to enter “Kenn Gyuf” to call out to the willful pixie.

dialogue.name: BEAVERA03395
dialogue.text: (-???-)<squeal> <squeal>

dialogue.name: BEAVERA03395
dialogue.text: (-Beaver-like Creature-)<squeal> <squeal>

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Though your beaver-speak is a bit rusty, the creature appears to want milk.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: However, you see no signs of Kenn Gyuf. You resign yourself to bearing the bad news back to Lad Kenn.

dialogue.name: BEAVERA03395
dialogue.text: <squeal> <squeal>

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The creature appears to want milk. However, you see no signs of Kenn Gyuf. You resign yourself to bearing the bad news back to Lad Kenn.

dialogue.name: LADKENN
dialogue.text: You're back! Where's Kenn Gyuf? Please tell me Kenn Gyuf is all right!

dialogue.name: LADKENN
dialogue.text: Wh-What? Against your warning, they went to Phisor Lran, where you found only a strange animal?

dialogue.name: LADKENN
dialogue.text: Th-Then the tales were true! Oh, Kenn Gyuf, why!? Why didn't you listen!? <sob>

dialogue.name: LADKENN
dialogue.text: ...Oh, I'm so sorry. I shouldn't assume the worst yet. Maybe there's still hope. I just...I just need to stay calm and think things through.
